entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
